title: How do I install the new client?
body: I've tried four times, each resulting in failure. I click the button before you login for league, and then try to run league. Says there's an error. No download shown for the new client. Nothing. How the hell do I install it? Thanks.

replies.body: What does the error say specifically? Does it say something similar to "please reinstall Alpha Client" or something else entirely? I'll need more info before I can help out. ^.^
